statements: DELETE FROM security_camera_footage WHERE camera_id = 1 AND timestamp > '2021-09-20';
DELETE FROM security_camera_footage WHERE location = 'Main Entrance' AND detection_results ->> 'person_detected' = 'true';
DELETE FROM VoiceCommandAnalytics WHERE success_status = FALSE;
DELETE FROM voice_commands_logs WHERE user_id = 100 AND camera_id = 2;
DELETE FROM security_camera_footage_metadata WHERE camera_id = 10 AND analysis_status = 'pending';
DELETE FROM voice_commands_logs WHERE user_id = 5 AND command_timestamp < '2023-01-01';
DELETE FROM CameraEvents WHERE event_type = 'Motion Detection';
DELETE FROM CameraAlerts WHERE acknowledged = FALSE;
